stories.headline: Databases highlight tired truckers
stories.summary: 'Dead Tired' is a series investigating the dangers of fatigued truck drivers. Using multiple databases, the research reveals a connection between excessive road hours and fatalities.

stories.headline: A conference report: NICAR in Philadelphia
stories.author_title: Missouri School of Journalism and NICAR
stories.summary: The annual NICAR conference in Philadelphia attracted over 400 journalists, focusing on computer-assisted reporting skills and techniques across various media platforms.

stories.headline: Tracking campaign donors through City Hall
stories.summary: Advice on maintaining databases on political contributors to better understand influences in local government and politics.
